meanings.definition: A condition in which the air sacs of the lungs are damaged and enlarged, causing breathlessness.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather struggles to breathe due to his emphysema.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with emphysema after the lung test.
meanings.sent3: Despite his emphysema, he still enjoys taking short walks in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, like emphysema in the silence.
meanings.sent5: The image of his emphysema lungs haunted her dreams.
